headline: NiSource (NYSE:NI) Declares US$0.28 Quarterly Dividend Payable May 2025
summary: Recently, NiSource (NYSE:NI) declared a dividend affirmation of $0.28 per share and announced earnings results for the full year ended December 31, 2024. Despite a slight downturn in sales and revenue, NiSource experienced improvements in net income and earnings per share, which might have bolstered investor sentiment. Over the last quarter, NiSource's share price increased by nearly 10%, a move that may be connected to the company's steady dividend payments and solid year-over-year earnings...
